result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda F. Fox was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: FTE, school or combination of the two and if not so engaged, complete 8 hours community service per week.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by agent.  AODA and follow up; outpatient treatment. 

DNA sample.

supervisions.notes:
CORRECTED
Concurrent with: all other sentences

PLEA: 
15CF435

15CF848

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made,  a factual basis & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: 5 1/2 YEARS PRISON TOTAL on each count> (2 1/2 yrs IC & 3 years ES) to run CONCURRENT with all other sentences: CONDITIONS:  Assessment/Treatment/Counseling as deemed appropriate by agent; FTW/School or combination of the two, and if not so engaged 8 hrs CS per week; AODA & Follow up; outpatient treatment; Absolute Sobriety; DNA sample & surcharge; CC
COURT notes Deft has 81 days jail credit in 15CF848 & 142 days jail credit in 15CF435; Deft qualifies for programming.

SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION IN 14CF718 (Count 1 & 2) & 14CF435 (Count 1)
COURT ORDERS: 3 1/2 YEARS PRISON TOTAL on each count> (18 Months I/C & 2 years ES) to run CONCURRENT with all other sentences: CONDITIONS: Assessment/Treatment/Counseling as Deemed appropriate by agent; FTW/School or combination of the two, and if not so engaged 8 hrs CS per week; AODA & Follow up; outpatient treatment; Absolute Sobriety; CC;
COURT notes DNA sample and surchage does not apply & Deft is entitled to 173 days credit in 14CF435; Deft qualifies for programming.
